translation: Arjuna said, "What is the condition of those who, disregarding the injunctions of the scriptures, perform sacrifice with faith—is it Sattva, Rajas, or Tamas, O Krishna?"
commentary: 17.1 Ye who? the ordinances of the scriptures? Leave setting aside? Yajante perform sacrifice? Shraddhaya with faith? Anvitaḥ endowed? their their? Loyalty condition? You verily? What's the what? Krishna O Krishna? Sattvam Sattva? Oh or? Rajah Rajas? Tamah Tamas.Commentary This chapter deals with the three kinds of people who are endowed with three kinds of faith.
